original_text: And this was the reason why he lifted up his hand against the king. Solomon built the Millo, and closed up the breach of the city of David his father.
korean_text: 그가 손을 들어 왕을 대적하는 까닭은 이러하니라 솔로몬이 밀로를 건축하고 그의 아버지 다윗의 성읍이 무너진 것을 수축하였는데

sentences.original_text: why he lifted up his hand against the king.
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 왕을 대적하여 손을 든 이유입니다

sentences.original_text: and closed up the breach of the city of David his father.
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 아버지 다윗 성의 틈을 막았습니다
